name: Project RA
description:
Project RA (Working Title) is an action Roguelite game. You can choose a character with unique weapon and skills, fighting against different enemies in random levels and getting random power-ups. 

The game has a  single-player mode and co-op mode that supports 4 players to play online.

The first prototype demo has been released! You can download and play it on PC. The demo contains one chapter with 3 playable characters. We would really love to get feedback and suggestions from you.

Please join our Discord!

- If you want to share your thoughts to  or talk anything with us

Follow us on Twitter!

- If you want to know moer development progress
